unnormalised:
Neota kul dharay, cheted doho pe pura thikana esela tabon pe:
Jaga renah nutum, building number, sarak nutum, elaka, nagar, ar 6-anko renah PIN code, jemon,
"The Grand Ballroom, Hotel Taj Palace, Sardar Patel Marg, Diplomatic Enclave, New Delhi, 110021".
Noa te do hapen hijuk ko, khaskar unko ko jahar do GPS istimal e kana, sahaj te jaga do topae daṛeaka!
normalised:
ᱱᱮᱣᱛᱟ ᱠᱚ ᱠᱩᱞ ᱚᱠᱛᱚᱨᱮ, ᱯᱩᱨᱟᱹ ᱴᱷᱤᱠᱟᱹᱱᱟᱹ ᱥᱟᱢᱤᱞ ᱛᱟᱦᱮᱱ ᱢᱟ ᱫᱤᱥᱟᱹᱭ ᱢᱮ:
ᱡᱟᱭᱜᱟ ᱧᱩᱛᱩᱢ, ᱵᱤᱞᱰᱤᱝ ᱱᱚᱢᱵᱚᱨ, ᱨᱚᱰ ᱧᱩᱛᱩᱢ, ᱮᱨᱤᱭᱟ, ᱥᱚᱦᱚᱨ, ᱟᱨ ᱪᱷᱚ-ᱟᱠᱷᱚᱨ ᱯᱤᱱ ᱠᱚᱰ, ᱡᱮᱢᱚᱱ, "The Grand Ballroom, Hotel Taj Palace, Sardar Patel Marg, Diplomatic Enclave, New Delhi, ᱢᱤᱫ ᱢᱤᱫ ᱥᱩᱱ ᱥᱩᱱ ᱵᱟᱨ ᱢᱤᱫ"
ᱱᱚᱣᱟᱛᱮ ᱦᱤᱡᱩᱜ ᱠᱟᱱ ᱠᱚ, ᱩᱱᱠᱩ ᱫᱚ ᱟᱨᱦᱚᱸ ᱡᱟᱦᱟᱸᱭ ᱡᱤ-ᱯᱤ-ᱮᱥ ᱠᱚ ᱵᱮᱵᱷᱟᱨᱮᱫᱟ, ᱥᱚᱦᱚᱡᱽ ᱛᱮ ᱡᱟᱭᱜᱟ ᱠᱚ ᱧᱟᱢ ᱫᱟᱲᱮᱭᱟᱜᱼᱟ!
text:
Neota kul dharay, cheted doho pe pura thikana esela tabon pe:
Jaga renah nutum, building number, sarak nutum, elaka, nagar, ar 6-anko renah PIN code, jemon,
"The Grand Ballroom, Hotel Taj Palace, Sardar Patel Marg, Diplomatic Enclave, New Delhi, 110021".
Noa te do hapen hijuk ko, khaskar unko ko jahar do GPS istimal e kana, sahaj te jaga do topae daṛeaka!
